holidays.title: Buy Nothing Day
holidays.description: An effort to combat the unethical and sometimes even dangerous mob shopping behaviors of Black Friday.

holidays.title: Celebrate Your Unique Talent Day
holidays.description: Your uniqueness is your strength and today is all about celebrating that.

holidays.title: D.B. Cooper Day
holidays.description: What more is there to this mysterious case of hijacking, air piracy, and intrepid skydiving?

holidays.title: Flossing Day
holidays.description: Learn the history of flossing and why you need to floss every day.

holidays.title: Fur-Free Friday
holidays.description: Today we denounce our cruelty, in the name of fashion, to fur-bearing animals.

holidays.title: Maize Day
holidays.description: The time has come to unwrap and savor this gift of nature.

holidays.title: National Day of Listening
holidays.description: There's something interesting for everyone to say or hear, so listen up!

holidays.title: National Oliver Day
holidays.description: Create a list of all Olivers in your vicinity and ensure you treat them well.

holidays.title: National Sardines Day
holidays.description: Sardines are a rich source of omega-3 fatty acids; vitamins D, B12, and B2; phosphorus.

holidays.title: Native American Heritage Day
holidays.description: Native Americans form the foundation of American culture, and that makes this day special.

holidays.title: Sinkie Day
holidays.description: Are you a sinkie? This special day was created just for you!

holidays.title: Systems Engineer Day
holidays.description: Systems Engineer Day celebrates those who create computer systems and debug those with problems.

holidays.title: You’re Welcomegiving Day
holidays.description: We’re learning new ways to say “you’re welcome” on this exciting day!

holidays.title: Grace Shadrack’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young YouTube star has created a niche for herself on social media.

holidays.title: Jimmy Graham’s Birthday
holidays.description: This NFL player began making history soon after he began playing professional football.

holidays.title: Katherine Heigl’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multitalented actress, producer, and model’s career has taken an upward trajectory since the beginning.

holidays.title: LiAngelo Ball’s Birthday
holidays.description: We say a warm “Happy birthday” to this exceptionally talented basketball player!

holidays.title: Natalie Odell’s Birthday
holidays.description: Millions of people adore Odell's D.I.Y., self-love, beauty, fashion, and lifestyle videos.

holidays.title: Peyton Meyer’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no stopping this talented and hardworking actor from establishing a successful career.

holidays.title: Sarah Hyland’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented and resilient actress has built her career successfully through her hard work and determination.

holidays.title: Savannah Jordan’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this reality star who has appeared alongside her family in several shows.

holidays.title: Scott Joplin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented musician and composer put an entire genre of music on the map!
